title: Zero Matrix
description:
Write a method `zeroMatrix` with an algorithm such that if an element in a MxN matrix is 0, its entire row and column are set to 0.

### Examples

```
[[1, 2, 3, 4],
 [5, 6, 7, 8],
 [9, 0, 1, 2],
 [3, 4, 5, 0]]
->
[[1, 0, 3, 0],
 [5, 0, 7, 0],
 [0, 0, 0, 0],
 [0, 0, 0, 0]]
```
